name: Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05 | Instant Plumping Effect in 4 Hours
description:
Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05: The Ultimate Volumizing Lip Experience

The Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05 delivers an extraordinary lip-plumping experience that transforms your pout with celestial radiance. This premium lip gloss combines volumizing technology with nourishing ingredients to create a fuller, more defined lip appearance without the uncomfortable tingling sensation common in other plumping products. 💋✨

With its innovative formula, the Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05 creates a subtle optical illusion that enhances your natural lip contours while providing exceptional hydration. The shade N 05 offers a versatile nude-pink hue with subtle shimmer particles that catch the light beautifully, making it perfect for both everyday wear and special occasions.

Product Information

Size 8ml / 0.27 fl oz
Gender Unisex
Product Type Volumizing Lip Gloss
Concentration High-shine formula
Brand Name Supernova

Key Features of Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05

  • Volumizing Effect: Advanced peptide complex creates visibly fuller lips
  • Non-Sticky Formula: Comfortable wear without the tacky feeling
  • Hydrating Ingredients: Enriched with hyaluronic acid and vitamin E
  • Long-Lasting Shine: Maintains glossy finish for up to 4 hours
  • Applicator: Precision doe-foot applicator for perfect application

The Science Behind Supernova Volume Lip Gloss

The Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05 utilizes a proprietary blend of micro-crystalline wax and light-reflecting particles that create dimension and the appearance of fullness. The formula includes moisturizing agents that help smooth fine lines while plumping ingredients work to enhance your natural lip contour. 🔬💄

This revolutionary lip gloss is part of the Supernova collection, which also includes the Supernova Matte Lipstick, Supernova Precision Lip Liner, and Supernova Overnight Lip Treatment for a complete lip care system.

Frequently Asked Question

How long does the volumizing effect of Supernova Volume Lip Gloss last?

The immediate volumizing effect of Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05 lasts approximately 3-4 hours after application. For maximum results, apply to clean, exfoliated lips. The formula also provides cumulative benefits with regular use, as the peptide complex helps stimulate natural collagen production over time, resulting in naturally fuller lips even when the product is not being worn. 🕒✨
short_description: Experience instant volume with Supernova Volume Lip Gloss - N 05. This non-sticky formula combines plumping peptides with light-reflecting particles for visibly fuller lips and spectacular shine that lasts for hours.
